sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTNBBS WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_DELETE_FL = '0'
$searchCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
DOMAIN_ID = #domainId#
DOMAIN_ID in ( $myDomainList$ )

SELECT A.BOARD_SID boardSid, A.BOARD_ID boardId, A.BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, A.ENG_NAME engName, A.SKIN_ID skinId, A.MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, A.ACTION_ID actionId FROM RFC_COMTNBBS A WHERE BOARD_DELETE_FL = '0'
$searchCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
A.SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
A.DOMAIN_ID = #domainId#
A.DOMAIN_ID in ( $myDomainList$ )
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$
ORDER BY BOARD_SID DESC
LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT A.BOARD_SID boardSid, A.BOARD_ID boardId, A.BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, A.ENG_NAME engName, A.SKIN_ID skinId, A.MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, A.ACTION_ID actionId FROM RFC_COMTNBBS A WHERE BOARD_DELETE_FL = '0'
$searchCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
A.SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
A.DOMAIN_ID = #domainId#
A.DOMAIN_ID in ( $myDomainList$ )
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$
ORDER BY BOARD_TITLE ASC

SELECT A.BOARD_SID boardSid, A.BOARD_ID boardId, A.BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, A.ENG_NAME engName, A.SKIN_ID skinId, A.MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, A.ACTION_ID actionId FROM RFC_COMTNBBS A WHERE BOARD_DELETE_FL = '0' AND ( 1=0
A.BOARD_SID = #boardSid#
A.BOARD_ID = #boardId#
)

SELECT A.BOARD_SID boardSid, A.BOARD_ID boardId, A.BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, A.ENG_NAME engName, A.SKIN_ID skinId, A.SKIN_TOP skinTop, A.SKIN_BOTTOM skinBottom, A.MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, A.ACTION_ID actionId FROM RFC_COMTNBBS A WHERE BOARD_DELETE_FL = '0' AND ( 1=0
A.BOARD_SID = #boardSid#
A.BOARD_ID = #boardId#
)

SELECT BOARD_SID boardSid, BOARD_ID boardId, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, DOMAIN_ID domainId, BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, ENG_NAME engName, BOARD_SUMMARY boardSummary, SKIN_ID skinId, ACTION_ID actionId, SKIN_TOP skinTop, SKIN_BOTTOM skinBottom, ORDERBY_STRING orderByString, BOARD_CEL boardCel, BOARD_ROW boardRow, BOARD_PAGE_BLOCK boardPageBlock, BOARD_NOTICE_FL boardNoticeFl, BOARD_SECRET_FL boardSecretFl, BOARD_DATE_ISUSE_FL boardDateIsUseFl, BOARD_EDITOR_FL boardEditorFl, BOARD_DATA_TAG_FL boardDataTagFl, BOARD_FILE_MODULE_FL boardFileModuleFl, BOARD_FILE_SIZE boardFileSize, BOARD_FILE_CNT updateAfterAct, UPDATE_AFTER_URL updateAfterUrl, DELETE_AFTER_ACT deleteAfterAct, DELETE_AFTER_URL deleteAfterUrl, DATA_PATTERN dataPattern, SKIN_TOP skinTop, SKIN_BOTTOM skinBottom, CATEGORY1_VIEW_FL BOARD_NOTICE_DATECHECK boardNoticeDateCheck, WRITE_ALERT writeAlert FROM RFC_COMTNBBS A WHERE 1=1 AND BOARD_DELETE_FL = '0' AND ( 1=0
A.BOARD_SID = #boardSid#
A. BOARD_ID = #boardId#
)
SELECT count(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTNBBS A WHERE 1=1 AND A.BOARD_ID = #boardId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO RFC_COMTNBBS ( BOARD_SID, BOARD_ID, SGROUP_ID, DOMAIN_ID, BOARD_TITLE, ENG_NAME, BOARD_SUMMARY, SKIN_ID, ACTION_ID, REGISTER_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, BOARD_NOTICE_DATECHECK ) VALUES ( #boardSid#, #boardId#, #sgroupId#, #domainId#, #boardTitle#, #engName#, #boardSummary#, #skinId#, #actionId#, #register_dt#, #modify_dt#, #boardNoticeDateCheck# )

INSERT INTO RFC_COMTNBBS ( BOARD_SID, BOARD_ID, SGROUP_ID, DOMAIN_ID, BOARD_TITLE, ENG_NAME, BOARD_SUMMARY, SKIN_ID, ACTION_ID, SKIN_TOP, SKIN_BOTTOM, ORDERBY_STRING, BOARD_CEL, BOARD_ROW, #domainId#, #boardTitle#, #engName#, #boardSummary#, #skinId#, #actionId#, #skinTop#, #skinBottom#, #orderByString#, #boardCel#, #boardRow#, #boardPageBlock#, #boardNoticeFl#, #boardSecretFl#, #boardDateIsUseFl#, #boardEditorFl#, #boardDataTagFl#, #boardFileModuleFl#, #boardFileSize#, #boardFileCnt#, #boardFileExtList#, #boardFileMemoFl#, #boardCommentFl#, #captchaIsUse#, #listPrivateFl#, #deleteContentUser#, #dataDeleteFlUser#, #smsIsUse#, #smsIsManager#, #boardNoticeDateCheck#, #writeAlert# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RFC_COMTNBBS SET SGROUP_ID=#sgroupId#, DOMAIN_ID=#domainId#, BOARD_TITLE=#boardTitle#, ENG_NAME=#engName#, BOARD_SUMMARY=#boardSummary#, SKIN_ID=#skinId#, ACTION_ID=#actionId#, SKIN_TOP=#skinTop#, SKIN_BOTTOM=#skinBottom#, ORDERBY_STRING=#orderByString#, BOARD_CEL=#boardCel#, BOARD_ROW=#boardRow#, BOARD_PAGE_BLOCK=#boardPageBlock#, BOARD_NOTICE_FL=#boardNoticeFl#, BOARD_SECRET_FL=#boardSecretFl#, BOARD_DATE_ISUSE_FL=#boardDateIsUseFl#, BOARD_EDITOR_FL=#boardEditorFl#, BOARD_DATA_TAG_FL=#boardDataTagFl#, BOARD_FILE_MODULE_FL=#boardFileModuleFl#, BOARD_FILE_SIZE=#boardFileSize#, BOARD_FILE_CNT=#boardFileCnt#, BOARD_FILE_EXT_LIST=#boardFileExtList#, BOARD_FILE_MEMO_FL=#boardFileMemoFl#, BOARD_COMMENT_FL=#boardCommentFl#, CAPTCHA_IS_USE=#captchaIsUse#, LIST_PRIVATE_FL=#listPrivateFl#, LIST_REPLY_FL=#listReplyFl#, LIST_VIEW_FL=#listViewFl#, LIST_OFFICE_FL=#listOfficeFl#, WRITE_BTN_VIEW_FL=#writeBtnViewFl#, REPLY_BTN_VIEW_FL=#replyBtnViewFl#, UPDATE_BTN_VIEW_FL=#updateBtnViewFl#, DELETE_BTN_VIEW_FL=#deleteBtnViewFl#, UPDATE_OFFICE_FL=#updateOfficeFl#, DELETE_OFFICE_FL=#deleteOfficeFl#, DATA_DELETE_FL=#dataDeleteFl#, DELETE_TITLE=#deleteTitle#, DELETE_CONTENT=#deleteContent#, DATA_TITLE_LENGTH=#dataTitleLength#, NEWICON_INTERVAL_TIME=#newiconIntervalTime#, WRITE_AFTER_ACT=#writeAfterAct#, WRITE_AFTER_URL=#writeAfterUrl#, UPDATE_AFTER_ACT=#updateAfterAct#, UPDATE_AFTER_URL=#updateAfterUrl#, DELETE_AFTER_ACT=#deleteAfterAct#, DELETE_AFTER_URL=#deleteAfterUrl#, DATA_PATTERN=#dataPattern#, CATEGORY1_VIEW_FL= #category1ViewFl#, CATEGORY2_VIEW_FL=#category2ViewFl#, CATEGORY3_VIEW_FL=#category3ViewFl#, PUBLIC_CATEGORY_FL=#publicCategoryFl#, DOC_STREAM_FL=#docStreamFl#, CCL_VIEW_FL=#cclViewFl#, MODIFY_DATE = #modify_dt#, DELETE_TITLE_USER = #deleteTitleUser#, DELETE_CONTENT_USER = #deleteContentUser#, DATA_DELETE_FL_USER = #dataDeleteFlUser#, SMS_IS_USE = #smsIsUse#, SMS_IS_MANAGER = #smsIsManager#, BOARD_NOTICE_DATECHECK = #boardNoticeDateCheck#, WRITE_ALERT = #writeAlert# WHERE BOARD_SID = #boardSid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.BOARD_SID boardSid, A.BOARD_ID boardId, A.BOARD_TITLE boardTitle, A.ENG_NAME engName, A.SKIN_ID skinId, A.MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, A.DOMAIN_ID domainId, A.ITEM_LIST itemList, A.ITEM_VIEW itemView, A.ITEM_WRITE itemWRITE, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId FROM RFC_COMTNBBS A WHERE A.BOARD_SID = #boardSid#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RFC_COMTNBBS SET ITEM_LIST = #itemList# WHERE BOARD_SID = #boardSid#
UPDATE RFC_COMTNBBS SET ITEM_VIEW = #itemView# WHERE BOARD_SID = #boardSid#
UPDATE RFC_COMTNBBS SET ITEM_WRITE = #itemWrite# WHERE BOARD_SID = #boardSid#
UPDATE RFC_COMTNBBS SET BOARD_DELETE_FL = 1 WHERE BOARD_SID = #boardSid#
